db:abstract.db:para: The MapRoute type displays a Route on a Map.
This type was introduced in QtLocation 5.0.

db:listitem.db:para: MapRoute is part of QML Maps Plugin

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The MapRoute type displays a Route obtained through a RouteModel or other means, on the Map as a Polyline following the path of the Route.
MapRoute is really a MapPolyline, but with the path specified using the route property instead of directly in coordinates.
By default, the route is displayed as a 1-pixel thick black line. This can be changed using the line.width and line.color properties.

db:section.db:title: line group
db:section.db:para: This property is part of the line property group. The line property group holds the width and color used to draw the line.
The width is in pixels and is independent of the zoom level of the map. The default values correspond to a black border with a width of 1 pixel.
For no line, use a width of 0 or a transparent color.

db:section.db:title: route : Route
db:section.db:para: This property holds the route to be drawn which can be used to represent one geographical route.
